pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Model for Genotyping using RNA-Seq // The method models RNA-seq reads using a mixture of 3 beta-binomial distributions to generate posterior probabilities for genotyping bi-allelic single nucleotide polymorphisms. Elena Vigorito, Anne Barton, Costantino Pitzalis, Myles J. Lewis and Chris Wallace (2023) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btad393 "BBmix: a Bayesian beta- binomial mixture model for accurate genotyping from RNA- sequencing."
